publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Este dwelling in aldersgate street,

notesStmt.note: Six partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus. Prim[us]."; part 2: "Cantus. Secund[us]."; part 3: "Altus."; part 4: "Tenor."; part 5: "Bassus."; part 6: "Sextus.".
